title: ECP resumes election programme for PP-73 Sargodha-III bye-election
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 13 (APP):The Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP) on Monday announced the resumption of the remaining activities of the Election Programme for Constituency No. PP-73 Sargodha-III.
The Commission has outlined the timeline for conducting the bye-election in the specified constituency.
As per the official timeline, the scrutiny of nomination papers will conclude by October 20. Appeals concerning the acceptance or rejection of these papers may be submitted until October 24, with final rulings to be issued by October 31.
The definitive list of candidates will be released on November 3, followed by the allotment of election symbols on November 4. The bye-election is scheduled to take place on November 23.
